content:
You ask the Guardian for more information about the dark force. The Guardian explains that the dark force is a manifestation of the negative emotions and thoughts that exist in the hearts of all beings in the multiverse. It feeds on fear, anger, and hate, and has grown so powerful that it threatens to destroy the fabric of reality. The Guardian also tells you that the only way to stop it is by balancing the negative emotions with positive emotions such as love, compassion and wisdom.

What would you like to do?

A) Accept the task and begin your journey
B) Refuse the task and go back to your normal life
C) Ask the Guardian for tips or advice on the journey

Please pick one of the options above (A,B,C) to continue.
